website_summaries.verdict: Bar Brat's seven-piece bar set deserves high praise for its well-engineered shaker. Good training set for beginning mixologists, too. Users may want to purchase additional pieces for specialty drinks, but the basics are covered.
pros: Shaker has strong seal, built-in strainer, and is large enough for ice cubes
Solid steel construction with an attractive stand
cons: Shaker not insulated, can get very cold in hands during use

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually used the set yet, but I'm super pleased with it. It's really a great deal and everything feels good quality. I got the recipe book in my email just a couple days after ordering the product, and the company even emailed me later to make sure I got it. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Bar Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really sleek little set that has everything you need to make cocktails in a small space. The organizer is what really makes this set special. It comes with a printable PDF file of 110 cocktail recipes! The recipes look pretty good, even though you may not see every variation known to man of the more obscure cocktails. But, you will have a starter recipe for just about anything!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Pot

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product info. 18oz shaker, not 24oz
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed to find out that the product description, stating that you receive a 24oz shaker with the set, was incorrect. The shaker is actually 18oz. Despite this incorrect product info, it is still a nice set. I do however know that there are basically identical sets for cheaper on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bar Brat
customer_reviews.text: This item showed up promptly as promised even though I ordered during the busy Christmas season!! It was packaged well and appears as shown in the picture. My husband is having a blast making cocktails with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. I wish it came with a muddler, and I really have to be sure to hold the lid on the shaker while shaking bc it isn't very tight ...I accidentally picked it up by the larger lid and the bottom fell out. It doesn't leak when shaking though, so I guess that's most important! I added some felt pads to the bottom so it wouldn't scratch my bar top and also bc several of the pieces sit in 2 holes, but don't stay in the second without a bit of lift off of the surface...felt pads fixed that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ables

customer_reviews.title: It's nice!
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly as described. Everything is nice and shiny although the box arrived damaged (yikes postal services!) Only wish is that I ordered a larger mixer as I do private parties and it's always easier to double up recipes. Works great though!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. Very durable. Only thing I would change is the stand. It has a hole where the cocktail strainer goes and the handle is so long that if you pick it up the strainer slides all the way down. Not a big issue considering I plan on leaving it in the spot that it is in. Overall I love it.

product_meta.title: Premium 7 Piece Cocktail Making Set & Bar Shaker Kit by Bar Brat / Free 130 Cocktail Recipe (ebook) Included/Pre-Built Stainless Steel Stand For All Your Bar Pieces
feature_bullets: ★ 7 PIECE BAR SET MAKES 6 - 10 DRINKS - As a trusted brand with many bar products, Bar Brat provides a complete bundle set - Includes 3 Piece Drink Shaker that is a 24 ounce cocktail shaker set with strong Built-in Cocktail Strainer and a Bonus Double size 1 & ½ oz. jigger

★ LONG LASTING BAR KIT - Made of the strongest stainless steel thus it is very strong. Our premium and protected packaging makes the Bar Brat cocktail shaker set the perfect holiday gift and christmas gift.
★ PERFECT SHOW PIECE FOR ENTERTAINING - Impress your friends with your bar kit and the pre built stand. And after the part, everything is easy to clean and dishwasher friendly.
★ ELEGANT GIFT PACKAGING - Our packaging is elegant and makes this cocktail shaker set the perfect holiday gift and christmas gift for anyone.

★ 100% LIFETIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - If you are not fully satisfied with your cocktail shaker, we will refund you your purchase. No questions asked. Add to cart and you will not be disappointed. 101 Cocktail Recipe Ebook To Be Emailed Immediately After Product Is Shipped
